title: Relay Certificate Pins
description: Certificate pinning configuration for Nostr relay connections. All relay connections MUST verify certificates against these pins to prevent MITM attacks.

wss://relay.damus.io.notes: Popular public relay. Chain: damus.io -> Google WE1 -> GTS Root R4 -> GlobalSign Root CA

wss://relay.primal.net.notes: Primal relay. Chain: primal.net -> Google WE1 -> GTS Root R4 -> GlobalSign Root CA

wss://relay.nostr.band.notes: Nostr search relay. Chain: nostr.band -> Let's Encrypt R13 -> ISRG Root X1

wss://nos.lol.notes: Popular public relay. Chain: nos.lol -> Let's Encrypt R13 -> ISRG Root X1

wss://relay.buildit.network.notes: BuildIt production relay - pins should be populated when deployed

wss://relay.dev.buildit.network.notes: BuildIt development relay - pins should be populated when deployed
